CHAT.comment: diary for nina27: nina spent last week+end in santa cruz visiting linda (nina's mother's younger sister). we will refer to this trip during the taping session. we went to santa cruz with a friend called nina is playing with a white plastic reindeer that mrs. wood (our neighbor) just gave her.

u.a: nina has found some other plastic animals and is piling them one on top of the other .
nina starts jabbering nonsense as she bounces the plastic animals around .
mother points to mrs . wood's plastic reindeer .
nina puts the reindeer on her mother's head .
nina giggles .
nina's mother had taken her to the san francisco zoo several months ago .
nina points to her bangs .
nina sticks up two fingers in front of her forehead .
nina points to her head .
nina points to her knee .
mother emphasizes the "his ."
nina points to the reindeer's antlers .
nina picks up the reindeer and touches the hoofs .
nina points to a small plastic pig that mrs . wood had just given her too .
nina pretends to make the pig eat .
nina starts jabbering as she bounces the reindeer around on the floor . nina is still calling a reindeer a goat .
mr . and mrs . wood had taken nina grocery shopping with them last night .
nina sticks the reindeer in a box .
nina had gone to the store last night right before going to sleep . she had been given the choice of a bedtime story or a trip to the store with the woods .
nina points to the reindeer in the box .
nina lays a plastic horse down in the box beside the reindeer .
mother sits down on the floor beside nina . nina puts the reindeer and the horse on her mother's knee .
nina puts a plastic truck underneath her mother's leg which is arched .
mother laughs .
nina is making the reindeer walk all over her mother's leg .
nina laughs and screams . mother starts to giggle .
nina continues laughing .
mother laughs as she tickles nina's belly+button .
nina starts tickling her mother .
nina laughing .
mother and nina laugh .
nina and her mother hug .
nina giggles . nina starts to run the plastic truck on her mother's leg .
nina points to her shoulder .
mother starts to tickle nina's knee .
nina is wearing her hair in two little pigtails fastened with elastic bands . she is very proud of her pigtails .
nina is flicking the spring of the door stop back and forth . she takes the rubber knob off .
nina tries to fit the rubber knob onto the end of the spring .
nina points to the door stop .
nina had had the bangs on her forehead cut yesterday by mrs . wood and her mother . she had sat very still in a high chair as her hair was being cut and made faces at herself in the mirror .
nina starts pushing a toy truck around on the floor .
nina and her mother had made several trips to the hospital when mister wood had been there .
Maya is a friend of nina's mother .
nina moves the bus , the truck , and a small tractor to the same spot .
nina holds up the plastic pig to her mother .
nina starts tickling the pig .
mother laughs .
nina moves the pig along her mother's leg .
nina gets in the starting position for a somersault .
mother starts to help nina make a somersault .
nina protests .
nina is lifting and lowering her legs .
Becca is a three year old friend of nina's .
at christmas time mother had brought nina to see santa claus at macy's . he had given her a candy cane . he was a very big santa claus and nina had been scared of him .
nina and her mother had gone out for supper to a restaurant that had little elves all around which looked very much like santa clauses .
one elf was drinking from a beer mug .
there had been some plastic animals mixed in with the elves .
at the restaurant there had been a collection of pretty foreign dolls all dressed up in costumes . also some carved wooden figures .
"few" mispronounced .
the wooden figures were men playing all different musical instruments . nina jabbers .
nina says "drum" instead of "strum ."
nina means that she sing songs with her two friends leila and justin who are at the baby-sitter's house during the day .
nina starts singing nonsense words in a loud voice .
maggie is nina's baby-sitter during the day . mother is referring to nina's hair+cut . nina sings the next sentence . most of the words are not distinguishable .
mother picks up two small plastic cows .
nina and her mother are going to move in a couple of weeks into a new house with another family . the house will be in a country like setting .
nina has made a little cake out of play+dough . she places some of the plastic animals on top . nina's mother had made birthday cup cakes several months ago on which she had placed small animals .
mother collects together some plastic animals .
nina starts to sing "happy birthday ."
mother is referring to nina's shopping trip last night with the woods .
nina is pulling the elastic off one of her pigtails .
nina hands the elastic bands to her mother . nina starts to protest .
last sentence not clear .
nina spots a bag of pipe cleaner and a woman's pipe which have just been given to her mother .
mother hands nina a red pipe cleaner and closes up the bag .
nina means that the pipe cleaner is dirty . she wants a new one .
nina takes another pipe cleaner out of the bag . her mother takes the bag away before she can take any more .
mother gives nina her pipe . nina pretends to clean it and hands it back to her mother .
mother pretends to smoke her pipe .
nina reaches for some more pipe cleaners .
mother points to the pipe cleaner in nina's hand .
mother makes a circle .
mother makes a worm .
mother laughs as she makes the pipe cleaner into a mustache which she sticks under nina's nose .
nina giggles as she sticks the pipe cleaner under her mother's nose .
mother holds the mustache up under nina's nose . nina lets out a scream .
nina bends the pipe cleaner into a circular shape .
nina starts jabbering . her words are hard to distinguish .
mother laughs .
nina is holding the pipe cleaner under her chin and giggling .
nina mispronounces "band ." she says "dand ."
nina mispronounces "band" the second time .
nina wants the pipe cleaner taken off from the dog's ear .
nina starts a sing-song jabber .
mother is looking at mrs . wood's plastic cow that nina has put on her small toy bus .
Debbie is one of nina's baby-sitters .
david is a friend of linda's .
linda lives in a college dormitory room at santa cruz .
linda has her bed made on top of a closet right under the ceiling .
nina had woken up with a dirty diaper .
nina is starting to get toilet trained .
nina has picked up her mother's pipe and is pretending to smoke it .
nina had been given a bubble pipe recently . she had had a hard time learning how to blow out rather than suck in on it and she had gotten several mouthfulls of soap bubbles .
linda had taken some dried seaweed pods , broken them in half , and made "monster" fingernails for nina and miriam which just fit over their fingers .
nina and miriam had chased nina's mother and linda all around the beach and they had pretended to be scared of the "monsters" with long fingernails .
nina starts making the roaring noises of a monster .
nina starts making monster noises again .
becky had fallen in the water and gotten completely soaked .
mother emphasizes "she" as opposed to "her" used by nina .
at the beach miriam and nina had had lots_of fun letting mother bury their feet .
nina points to her foot .
nina struggles to take her shoes off .
mother helps nina get one shoe off .
nina wants to pretend that she's at the beach right now .
nina starts walking around her room barefoot , pretending it's the beach .
mother and nina continue to pretend that nina's room has turned into a great big sandy beach .
mother covers up nina's foot with a cloth which she pretends is sand .
nina points to the cloth . last three sentences not clear .
nina points to another rag .
mother covers one of nina's feet with another rag .
nina kicks the rag off .
mother is now referring to the outing at the beach .
nina points to her pants .
mother points to a patch on the knee of the pants .
mother points to a patch on the knee .
nina is struggling to take off a shirt which needs to be unbuttoned .
nina is trying to take off a hand-me-down shirt of Becca krantz .
the shirt is quite tight so mother has trouble getting it off .
nina starts to protest .
mother hands the the clothes that have just been taken off to nina and points to the dirty clothes hamper in the corner of her room .
nina points to the undershirt that she still has on .
nina tries to pull the undershirt off over her head .
nina starts to cry because her undershirt doesn't come off .
nina starts to put her undershirt in the diaper pail .
some scotch tape is stuck to nina's foot .
nina protests because she can't get the scotch tape off her foot .
mother pulls the scotch tape off nina's shoes .
nina picks up some wet diapers from the floor .
nina starts to put the diapers in the back of her dumptruck .
mother points to the diaper pail . nina starts putting her animals in the dumptruck and riding them around .
justin is the son of the baby-sitter .
mother goes out of nina's room to look for a pail and shovel . one can hear nina's and mother's voice in the distance .
mother comes back into nina's room with a pail and shovel .
nina has been around some boys recently who were playing with guns .
nina pretends to dig in the sand .
mother points to a plastic glass .
nina hands mother a plastic glass .
mother picks up a red block and pretends it's a shovel .
nina does not finish the word "animal ."
justin is the one year old son of maggie , nina's baby-sitter . he always puts sand in his mouth when they are playing in the sand box .
"she says" not pronounced clearly .
"sitting" is pronounced "singing" in nina's last two sentences .
nina is making all the gestures of gathering up sand and forming into cakes etc .
mother pretends to be making a cake out of sand .
nina pretends to hand mother a cupcake .
mother pretends to hand a cupcake to nina .
"vanilla" mispronounced .
"chocolate" mispronounced .
"vanilla" mispronounced .
mother emphasizes the "v" .
nina is still mispronouncing "vanilla ."
mother points to a small table in the middle of nina's room .
nina follows her mother as she goes out of the room to look for paper . the next five sentences are uttered out of nina's room .
mother comes back into nina's room with some paper .
mother spreads out a large sheet of paper on nina's table .
mother hands nina the box of crayons .
nina takes a crayon out of the box .
last week-end we had spent a whole afternoon playing in a huge meadow on the campus of santa cruz .
nina draws some lines on the paper .
mother points to the picture of grass that nina has drawn . mother starts to draw some figures of people which nina will point to as mother questions her about them .
mother draws miriam .
nina had had a lot of fun playing tag with miriam and becky in the meadow .
becky is miriam's older sister . they were both in santa cruz with nina .
nina points to a space next to the figure in the picture representing herself .
mother points to the figure of miriam .
nina starts to draw on her mother's knee with a crayon .
nina points to the figure of becky drawn on the paper .
mother points to the clouds she's drawn .
nina points to the spot on the paper where she wants her mother to be drawn in .
nina points to the figure of her mommy in the picture .
mother points to the figure of nina in the picture .
nina points to the various figures in the picture .
nina points to the same figure for both her own and becky's mother .
mother points to the figure of herself in the picture .
nina looks around in the picture trying to find the figure of another mother .
mother starts to draw another figure .
"behind" mispronounced .
nina points to the spot on the paper where she wants becky and miriam's mother to be drawn .
mother hands nina a red crayon . nina starts to draw .
nina draws with a crayon on the figure of her mommy .
nina starts using the red crayon to draw clothes on all the figures .
mother laughs .
mother draws a swing and slide in the picture .
the girls had gone for a ride on some swings and slides .
nina points to the swing that her mother has drawn .
"slide" mispronounced .
nina points to the picture of the slide .
there were some four seater swings .
mother draws some more swings .
mother had been able to fit on the four seater swing with the girls .
nina "draws" some seats as she utters the next sentences .
last sentence not clear .
nina interrupts . a friend of nina's mother also named miriam had come over with her daughter samantha .
nina interrupts again and continues drawing on the picture .
nina had really liked the hard boiled eggs that mother had brought along .
mother and nina laugh .
mother had cut up all sorts of raw vegetables for the picnic .
we had gone to McDonald's for a hamburger for supper when we were in santa Cruz .
nina confuses the name of the song with the name of the hamburger stand .
"sippy-dippers" are special straws in an "m" shape which we had used on a previous visit to a McDonald's restaurant .
nina "draws" a hamburger .
nina is drawing on some plastic cups trying to make them look like the cups one gets at a McDonald's restaurant .
next three sentences are very soft and hard to distinguish .
nina jumps around on her mother who is sitting on the floor . mother and nina start laughing .
mother and nina continue laughing as they wrestle with each other .
nina had her hair cut by mrs . wood and her mother recently .
nina starts to draw on her mother with crayons .
nina giggles mischievously .
there had been quite a few large dogs wandering around linda's dorm . they had kept the children awake when they were trying to get to sleep at night .
mother holds up a pink nightgown that had recently been handed down to nina by her friend erin .
mother helps nina put on her nightgown and button it .
mother is struggling with the buttons on nina's nightgown .
nina lifts up her nightgown and mother points to her belly+button .
mother laughs .
mother laughs again .
nina points to her belly+button .
